original: Tena kho pana samayena therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadanti pariyāyena.

original: Āyasmā nandako na icchati bhikkhuniyo ovadituṁ pariyāyena.
analyzed: āyasmā nandakaḥ naḥ icchati bhikkhuniyaḥ ovaditum pariyāyena

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:

original: “kassa nu kho, ānanda, ajja pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo ovadituṁ pariyāyenā”ti?

original: “Sabbeheva, bhante, kato pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo ovadituṁ pariyāyena.

original: Ayaṁ, bhante, āyasmā nandako na icchati bhikkhuniyo ovadituṁ pariyāyenā”ti.

original: karohi tvaṁ, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhunīnaṁ dhammiṁ kathan”ti.

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā nandako bhagavato paṭissutvā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmā nandakaḥ bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya sāvatthim piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto attadutiyo yena rājakārāmo tenupasaṅkami.

original: Seyyathāpi, bhaginiyo, dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā gāviṁ vadhitvā tiṇhena govikantanena gāviṁ saṅkanteyya anupahacca antaraṁ maṁsakāyaṁ anupahacca bāhiraṁ cammakāyaṁ.

original: Yaṁ yadeva tattha antarā vilimaṁsaṁ antarā nhāru antarā bandhanaṁ taṁ tadeva tiṇhena govikantanena sañchindeyya saṅkanteyya sampakanteyya samparikanteyya.
analyzed: yam yat eva antarā vilimasam antarā nhāru antarā bandhanam tam tat eva tiṇhena go vikantanena sañchindeyya saṅkanteyya sampakanteyya samparikanteyya

original: Sañchinditvā saṅkantitvā sampakantitvā samparikantitvā vidhunitvā bāhiraṁ cammakāyaṁ teneva cammena taṁ gāviṁ paṭicchādetvā evaṁ vadeyya:

tathā iva ayam gāvī sayuttā iminā ava cammena ati

original: sammā nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?

naḥ heta bhante

original: Yaṁ yadeva tattha antarā vilimaṁsaṁ antarā nhāru antarā bandhanaṁ taṁ tadeva tiṇhena govikantanena sañchindeyya saṅkanteyya sampakanteyya samparikanteyya.
analyzed: yam yat eva antarā vilimasam antarā nhāru antarā bandhanam tam tat eva tiṇhena go vikantanena sañchindeyya saṅkanteyya sampakanteyya samparikanteyya

original: Sañchinditvā saṅkantitvā sampakantitvā samparikantitvā vidhunitvā bāhiraṁ cammakāyaṁ teneva cammena taṁ gāviṁ paṭicchādetvā kiñcāpi so evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: sañchinditvā saṅkantitvā sampakantitvā samparikantitvā vidhunitvā bāhiram camma kāyam tena iva cammena tam gāvim paṭicchādetvā kiñca api saḥ evam vadeyya
tathā iva ayam gāvī sayuttā iminā ava cammena ati

original: atha kho sā gāvī visaṁyuttā teneva cammenā”ti.
analyzed: atha kho sā gāvī visa yuttā tena iva cammena ati

original: “Upamā kho me ayaṁ, bhaginiyo, katā atthassa viññāpanāya.
analyzed: upamā kho me bhaginiyo katā atthassa viññāpanāya
ayam eva itthā atthaḥ

original: ‘antarā maṁsakāyo’ti kho, bhaginiyo, channetaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ āyatanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
analyzed: antarā kho bhaginiyo ajjhattikānam āyatanānam

original: ‘bāhiro cammakāyo’ti kho, bhaginiyo, channetaṁ bāhirānaṁ āyatanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
analyzed: bāhiraḥ camma kāyaḥ iti kho bhaginiyo bāhirānam āyatanānam adhivacana

original: ‘antarā vilimaṁsaṁ, antarā nhāru, antarā bandhanan’ti kho, bhaginiyo, nandīrāgassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
analyzed: antarā kho bhaginiyaḥ nandīrāgassa etam

original: ‘tiṇhaṁ govikantanan’ti kho, bhaginiyo, ariyāyetaṁ paññāya adhivacanaṁ;
analyzed: tiṇham go vikantananti kho bhaginiyaḥ ariyāya itam paññāya

original: yāyaṁ ariyā paññā antarā kilesaṁ antarā saṁyojanaṁ antarā bandhanaṁ sañchindati saṅkantati sampakantati samparikantati.
analyzed: yā ayam ariyā paññā antarā kilesam antarā sayojanam antarā bandhanam sañchindati saṅkantati sampakantati samparikantati

original: Satta kho panime, bhaginiyo, bojjhaṅgā, yesaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā bhikkhu āsavānaṁ
analyzed: satta kho panime bhaginiyaḥ bojjhaṅgāḥ yesam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā

original: khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā
analyzed: khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā
upasampajja viharati
katame satta

original: Idha, bhaginiyo, bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
analyzed: idha bhaginiyo bhikkhu sati sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka nissitam virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmi
dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti pe
vīriya sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti
pīti sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti
passaddhi sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti
samādhi sambojjhaṅgam bhāva iti

original: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
analyzed: upekkhā sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka nissitam virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmi

original: Ime kho, bhaginiyo, satta bojjhaṅgā, yesaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā bhikkhu āsavānaṁ
analyzed: ime kho bhaginiyo satta bojjhaṅgāḥ yesam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā

original: khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā
analyzed: khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā
upasampajja viharati iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā nandako tā bhikkhuniyo iminā ovādena ovaditvā uyyojesi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā nandako tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uyyojesi
gacchatha bhaginiyaḥ kālā uti

original: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmato nandakassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
analyzed: atha kho tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ āyasmataḥ nandakassa bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā

original: āyasmantaṁ nandakaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: āyasmantam nandakam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhaṁsu. Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho tā
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhasu ekamantam ṭhitā kho tā
bhikkhuniyaḥ bhagavā etat avoca
gacchatha bhikkhuniyo kālo ti

original: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkamiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkamisu

original: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkantīsu tāsu bhikkhunīsu bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā acira pakkantīsu tāsu bhikkhunīsu bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe cātuddase na hoti bahuno janassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā:
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave tadahu posathe cātuddase na hoti bahunaḥ janassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā

original: ‘ūno nu kho cando, puṇṇo nu kho cando’ti, atha kho ūno cando tveva hoti.
analyzed: ūnaḥ nu kho cando puṇṇaḥ nu kho cando iti atha kho ūnaḥ cando tu eva hoti

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, tā bhikkhuniyo nandakassa dhammadesanāya attamanā honti no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappā”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ nandakassa dhamma desanāya attamanāḥ honti no ca kho paripuṇṇa saṅkappā ati

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ nandakaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam nandakam āmantesi

original: “tena hi tvaṁ, nandaka, svepi tā bhikkhuniyo tenevovādena ovadeyyāsī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi tva nandaka sve pi tāḥ bhikkhuniyo tena iva uvādena ovadeyyāsi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā nandako bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmā nandakaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Atha kho āyasmā nandako tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā nandakaḥ tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya sāvatthim piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto attadutiyo yena rājakārāmo tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: sāvatthiyam piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ atta dutiyaḥ yena rājaka ārāmaḥ tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasaṁsu kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṁ nandakaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
analyzed: addasasu kho tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ āyasmantam nandakam dūratas vas āgacchanta

original: Disvāna āsanaṁ paññāpesuṁ, udakañca pādānaṁ upaṭṭhapesuṁ.
analyzed: disvāna āsanam paññāpesu udakam ca pādānam upaṭṭhapesu

original: Nisīdi kho āyasmā nandako paññatte āsane.
analyzed: nisīdi kho āyasmā nandako paññatte āsane
nisajja pāde pakkhālesi

original: Tāpi kho bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṁ nandakaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
analyzed: tāḥ api kho bhikkhuniyaḥ āyasmantam nandakam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmā nandako etadavoca:

original: “Ettakenapi mayaṁ, bhante, ayyassa nandakassa attamanā abhiraddhā yaṁ no ayyo nandako pavāretī”ti.

original: yā ca khvāssa ābhā sā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā’ti;
analyzed: yā ca khvā assa ābhā sā niccā dhuvā sassatā a vipariṇāma dhammā ati

original: sammā nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?

original: “Amussa hi, bhante, telappadīpassa jhāyato telampi aniccaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, vaṭṭipi aniccā vipariṇāmadhammā, accipi aniccā vipariṇāmadhammā;

pageva assa ābhā aniccā vipariṇāma dhammā ti

original: “Evameva kho, bhaginiyo, yo nu kho evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: evam eva khalu bhaginiyaḥ yaḥ nu khalu evam vadeyya
cha kho ume ajjhattikā āyatanā aniccā

original: Yañca kho cha ajjhattike āyatane paṭicca paṭisaṁvedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā taṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhamman’ti;
analyzed: yat ca kho cha ajjhattike āyatane paṭicca paṭisavedeti sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā tam niccam dhuvam sassatam a vipariṇāma dhammanti

original: sammā nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
analyzed: sammā nu kho saḥ bhaginiyaḥ vadamānaḥ vadeyya iti
naḥ heta bhante
tam kim sa hetu

original: “Tajjaṁ tajjaṁ, bhante, paccayaṁ paṭicca tajjā tajjā vedanā uppajjanti.
analyzed: tajjam tajja bhante paccayam paṭicca tajjā tajjā vedanā uppajjanti

original: Tajjassa tajjassa paccayassa nirodhā tajjā tajjā vedanā nirujjhantī”ti.

original: Evañhetaṁ, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasāvakassa yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato.

original: Seyyathāpi, bhaginiyo, mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato mūlampi aniccaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ,

original: khandhopi anicco vipariṇāmadhammo, sākhāpalāsampi aniccaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, chāyāpi
analyzed: khandhaḥ pi aniccaḥ vipariṇāma dhammaḥ sākhā palāsam pi aniccam vipariṇāma dhamma chāyā api

original: Yo nu kho, bhaginiyo, evaṁ vadeyya:

naḥ heta bhante
tam kim sa hetu

original: “Amussa hi, bhante, mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato mūlampi aniccaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, khandhopi anicco vipariṇāmadhammo, sākhāpalāsampi aniccaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ;
analyzed: amussa hi bhante mahataḥ rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ mūlam pi aniccam vipariṇāma dhamma khandhaḥ pi aniccaḥ vipariṇāma dhammaḥ sākhā palāsam pi aniccam vipariṇāma dhamma
pageva assa chāyā aniccā vipariṇāma dhammā ti

original: “Evameva kho, bhaginiyo, yo nu kho evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: evam eva khalu bhaginiyaḥ yaḥ nu khalu evam vadeyya
cha khome bāhirā āyatanā aniccā

original: Yañca kho bāhire āyatane paṭicca paṭisaṁvedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā taṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhamman’ti;
analyzed: yat ca kho bāhire āyatane paṭicca paṭisavedeti sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā tam niccam dhuvam sassatam a vipariṇāma dhammanti

original: sammā nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
analyzed: sammā nu kho saḥ bhaginiyaḥ vadamānaḥ vadeyya iti
naḥ heta bhante
tam kim sa hetu

original: “Tajjaṁ tajjaṁ, bhante, paccayaṁ paṭicca tajjā tajjā vedanā uppajjanti.
analyzed: tajjam tajja bhante paccayam paṭicca tajjā tajjā vedanā uppajjanti

original: Tajjassa tajjassa paccayassa nirodhā tajjā tajjā vedanā nirujjhantī”ti.
analyzed: tajjassa tajjassa paccayassa nirodhā tajjā tajjā vedanā nirujjhanti iti
sādhu sādhu bhaginiyo

original: Evañhetaṁ, bhaginiyo, hoti ariyasāvakassa yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato.
analyzed: evam ha ita bhaginiyaḥ hoti ariya sāvakassa yathābhūtam sammappaññāya passato

original: Seyyathāpi, bhaginiyo, dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā gāviṁ vadhitvā tiṇhena govikantanena gāviṁ saṅkanteyya anupahacca antaraṁ maṁsakāyaṁ anupahacca bāhiraṁ cammakāyaṁ.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhaginiyaḥ dakkhaḥ go ghātakaḥ vā go ghātaka antevāsī vā gāvim vadhitvā tiṇhena go vikantanena gāvim saṅkanteyya anupahacca antaram masakāyam anupahacca bāhiram cammakāya

original: Yaṁ yadeva tattha antarā vilimaṁsaṁ antarā nhāru antarā bandhanaṁ taṁ tadeva tiṇhena govikantanena sañchindeyya saṅkanteyya sampakanteyya samparikanteyya.
analyzed: yam yat eva antarā vilimasam antarā nhāru antarā bandhanam tam tat eva tiṇhena go vikantanena sañchindeyya saṅkanteyya sampakanteyya samparikanteyya

original: Sañchinditvā saṅkantitvā sampakantitvā samparikantitvā vidhunitvā bāhiraṁ cammakāyaṁ teneva cammena taṁ gāviṁ paṭicchādetvā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: sañchinditvā saṅkantitvā sampakantitvā samparikantitvā vidhunitvā bāhiram camma kāyam tena iva cammena tam gāvim paṭicchādetvā evam vadeyya
tathā iva ayam gāvī sayuttā iminā ava cammena ati

original: sammā nu kho so, bhaginiyo, vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
analyzed: sammā nu kho saḥ bhaginiyaḥ vadamānaḥ vadeyya iti
naḥ heta bhante
tam kim sa hetu

original: “Amu hi, bhante, dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā gāviṁ vadhitvā tiṇhena govikantanena gāviṁ saṅkanteyya anupahacca antaraṁ maṁsakāyaṁ anupahacca bāhiraṁ cammakāyaṁ.
analyzed: amu hi bhante dakkhaḥ go ghātakaḥ vā go ghātaka antevāsī vā gāvim vadhitvā tiṇhena go vikantanena gāvim saṅkanteyya an upahacca antaram masakāyam an upahacca bāhiram cammakāya

original: Yaṁ yadeva tattha antarā vilimaṁsaṁ antarā nhāru antarā bandhanaṁ taṁ tadeva tiṇhena govikantanena sañchindeyya saṅkanteyya sampakanteyya samparikanteyya.
analyzed: yam yat eva antarā vilimasam antarā nhāru antarā bandhanam tam tat eva tiṇhena go vikantanena sañchindeyya saṅkanteyya sampakanteyya samparikanteyya

original: Sañchinditvā saṅkantitvā sampakantitvā samparikantitvā vidhunitvā bāhiraṁ cammakāyaṁ teneva cammena taṁ gāviṁ paṭicchādetvā kiñcāpi so evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: sañchinditvā saṅkantitvā sampakantitvā samparikantitvā vidhunitvā bāhiram camma kāyam tena iva cammena tam gāvim paṭicchādetvā kiñca api saḥ evam vadeyya
tathā iva ayam gāvī sayuttā iminā ava cammena ati

original: atha kho sā gāvī visaṁyuttā teneva cammenā”ti.
analyzed: atha kho sā gāvī visa yuttā tena iva cammena ati

original: “Upamā kho me ayaṁ, bhaginiyo, katā atthassa viññāpanāya ayamevettha attho.
analyzed: upamā kho me bhaginiyo katā atthassa viññāpanāya ayam eva ittha atthaḥ

original: ‘Antarā maṁsakāyo’ti kho, bhaginiyo, channetaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ āyatanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
analyzed: antarā kho bhaginiyo ajjhattikānam āyatanānam

original: ‘bāhiro cammakāyo’ti kho, bhaginiyo, channetaṁ bāhirānaṁ āyatanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
analyzed: bāhiraḥ camma kāyaḥ iti kho bhaginiyo bāhirānam āyatanānam adhivacana

original: ‘antarā vilimaṁsaṁ antarā nhāru antarā bandhanan’ti kho, bhaginiyo, nandīrāgassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
analyzed: antarā vilimasam antarā nhāru antarā kho bhaginiyaḥ nandīrāgassa itam

original: ‘tiṇhaṁ govikantanan’ti kho, bhaginiyo, ariyāyetaṁ paññāya adhivacanaṁ;
analyzed: tiṇham go vikantananti kho bhaginiyaḥ ariyāya itam paññāya

original: yāyaṁ ariyā paññā antarā kilesaṁ antarā saṁyojanaṁ antarā bandhanaṁ sañchindati saṅkantati sampakantati samparikantati.
analyzed: yā ayam ariyā paññā antarā kilesam antarā sayojanam antarā bandhanam sañchindati saṅkantati sampakantati samparikantati

original: Satta kho panime, bhaginiyo, bojjhaṅgā, yesaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā bhikkhu āsavānaṁ
analyzed: satta kho panime bhaginiyaḥ bojjhaṅgāḥ yesam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā

original: khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā

katame satta

original: Idha, bhaginiyo, bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.

dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti pe
vīriya sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti

original: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
analyzed: upekkhā sambojjhaṅgam bhāveti viveka nissitam virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmi

original: Ime kho, bhaginiyo, satta bojjhaṅgā yesaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā bhikkhu āsavānaṁ
analyzed: ime kho bhaginiyo satta bojjhaṅgāḥ yesam bhāvita ttā bahulīkata ttā

original: khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā

original: Atha kho āyasmā nandako tā bhikkhuniyo iminā ovādena ovaditvā uyyojesi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā nandako tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uyyojesi
gacchatha bhaginiyaḥ kālā uti

original: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo āyasmato nandakassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā

original: āyasmantaṁ nandakaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: āyasmantam nandakam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhaṁsu. Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho tā
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhasu ekamantam ṭhitā kho tā
bhikkhuniyaḥ bhagavā etat avoca
gacchatha bhikkhuniyo kālo ti

original: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkamiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkamisu

original: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkantīsu tāsu bhikkhunīsu bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā acira pakkantīsu tāsu bhikkhunīsu bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe pannarase na hoti bahuno janassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā:
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave tadahu posathe pannarase na hoti bahunaḥ janassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā

original: ‘ūno nu kho cando, puṇṇo nu kho cando’ti, atha kho puṇṇo cando tveva hoti;
analyzed: ūnaḥ nu kho cando puṇṇaḥ nu kho cando iti atha kho puṇṇaḥ cando tu eva hoti

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, tā bhikkhuniyo nandakassa dhammadesanāya attamanā ceva paripuṇṇasaṅkappā ca.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ nandakassa dhamma desanāya attamanāḥ ca iva paripuṇṇa saṅkappā ca

original: Tāsaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ bhikkhunisatānaṁ yā pacchimikā bhikkhunī sā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā”ti.
analyzed: tāsa bhikkhave pañcannam bhikkhuni satānam yā pacchimikā bhikkhunī sā sotāpannā a vinipāta dhammā niyatā sambodhi parāyanā ati
idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti
nandaka uvāda suttam niṭṭhitam catuttha
